website_summaries.verdict: This fantastic razor puts the shaving cream right on the razor and lathers and moisturizes during shaving. No need for added soap or body wash!
pros: Enriched with Vitamin E and aloe
Perfect for those who have sensitive skin
Pivoting head to reduce amount of nicks and cuts
cons: Hard to clean out between uses

customer_reviews.title: My how times have changed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a Personal Touch razor since college in the 70s. They finally discontinued it so I was forced to modernize. I rarely shave my legs, so when I do I have to go over and over the same area. So I read reviews on all the newfangled razors and chose Schick intuition for sensitive skin. I don’t want to smell like some bizarre fragrance. Love this razor! No shave cream needed and it cut my hair close with the first swipe. No smelly scent and my skin was moisturized. Now if I could figure out Instagram, I’d really be a modern woman!!
customer_reviews.author: J.w. Maine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - Removes only spots of hair
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this based on reviews. I was disappointed. This is extremely bulky. Works ok on legs but misses hair on knees and behind knees. Very awkward on bikini and armpit areas because of how large it is - missing many spots of hair, as well. The soap bar surrounding it melts away quickly - especially on one side, more than the other. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the 'older' woman
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor. I first used one when I visited my daughter, and had to use hers when I had forgotten mine. After using it once, I realized I needed one! Being an 'older woman' (over age 50) - my face seems to love to grow facial hair. This is the first razor I've used that 'gets it' the first time around. Leaves my chin so nice as smooth and soft. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PreciousPup

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like this at all
customer_reviews.text: Worst razor for the money. It moisturizes great but the moisture part disintegrates after about 5 uses. It’s bulky and not hand friendly
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I spend my money on. Everyone needs this razor!!’ I buy it for all my friends who are pregnant or have had babies (so easy and quick) and also for anyone going on a trip. I travel often and this makes it so easy to shave my legs daily and in any situation.....a tiny European shower? Yep. A ferry boat sink? Yep. An outdoor faucet. Yep. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bartz

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALLERGY FRIENDLY
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that they have started to add “sweet almond oil” to everything. I loved the convince of these razors but I have a severe nut allergy and now even the aloe ones have almond in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great shave no shaving cream needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bar acts as shaving cream while you shave. The refills are pricy but it's a great shave ! I don't have razor bumps and I use a new razor, every 7days bc I Shave everyday.
customer_reviews.author: BMS

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a men's razor, but I decided to give this one a try. I ordered it for sensitive skin because I get razor burn really badly. The razor is easy to use, glides onto skin so smooth, and gets every hair EFFORTLESSLY!! My legs have never felt more soft and fresh! I definitely recommend this to someone who gets razor burn badly like I do and someone who wants a razor that actually gets every single hair and leaves nothing behind.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne L Vogie

customer_reviews.title: The best razor around - no need for shaving foam
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with polka dots on it....whatever lol. This is my favorite razor. This is great for dry skin and still shaves really closely. I use this on my arms, works amazingly and you don't knick yourself at all. Good for legs, pits, all over. Stays sharp for longer than competitors. I have tried them all ladies! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I rember
customer_reviews.text: Use to love this razor but I hadn't used one in over a year. Not at all what they use to be. Blade was dull, I had to keep going back over the same spot several times to remove all the hair. I ended up using both heads just to shave my legs and underarms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great razor the first two uses. Then the head needs to be replaced. I switched razors after buying head replacements twice. Gets to be too expensive. I do like this razor though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley bishop

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these razors to shave my legs. I was not at all pleased. I did not get a close shave like I do with mens razors.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri R

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good razor but nothing any other razor can’t do. The moisturizer/soap is good and makes your skin very soft while lasts but if you shave in the shower like I do, it will last you maybe 3 shaves before it’s completely gone. It’s impossible to clean out the razor with the huge soap attached. By the time the soap has dissolved, the razor is pretty much useless and filled with hair that hasn’t been cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: Kabita Adhikari

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean out
customer_reviews.text: This is that typical razor that “moisturizers” but lease a streaky feeling on your skin. I also had quite a bit of leg hair built up from quarentine that would not clean out of the razor. So annoying I just threw it out!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Argo

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This shavers is very hard to use and in pretty much ineffective when trying to shave curvier areas like underarms. The moisturizer is so thick that it gets in the way so to try to compensate you get cut. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for one use
customer_reviews.text: Can only use like 2 times til the cream melts down. Then what?Might as well do dollar shave club
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Grant

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work very well. The Shea coconut around the razor disappears within a week or two and then you’re left with a subpar razor. Save your money and buy the Schick Hydro
customer_reviews.author: Hayden McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I used it 4 times and the cream was all done. I think they also sent me a damaged piece. The blade is kinda loose and doesnt shave well. I later realized the piece I got might have been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not very pleased. I didn’t have to use shaving cream but it gave me a razor burn in the more sensitive areas(which the cream would of helped) and had some hairs that it didn’t get on my legs that other razors would get. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Schmelzer Gorls

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave, difficult to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I liked this razor the first time I used it, but like all razors with moisturizer the aloe and foam stuff wore off within 2 or 3 uses. The head is also really clunky and noisy, and because the head is wide it was hard to angle it for tricky areas like knees, toes, armpits, etc. Also I don't know what is meant by "suction power" but this doesn't have any that I could figure out. I also haven't been able to get a close shave because the large head around the razor made it difficult to be precise.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but good to avoid razor burn
customer_reviews.text: Great for avoiding razor burn. The lathering edge makes it harder to get all the hair shaved though. It gets to soapy and slick and the razor edge just slides over the hair follicles too easy so when I’m done shaving I still find a few hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap soap and blades
customer_reviews.text: The soap is very sticky and doesn't last more than a couple showers. The blades get dull after one use. The soap fades very quickly once it hits the water. Hair is always stuck in the blades. Very cheap products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these razors, I have the most sensitive skin and always have issues with razors causing razor bumps no matter what. But these razors allow me to keep up with smooth legs and not feel ashamed or embarrassed in public when showing them off.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and leaves my skin so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don’t need shaving cream and this razor leaves my skin even softer! I don’t believe I will ever buy another brand! Highly recommend this razor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible razor it cuts ur skin too easily and it cloggs too quick.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sensitive Skin!!
customer_reviews.text: When I shave or shower, I have to be extra careful with what I use. If not, I'll get super itchy and my skin will be irritated. I can shave with this and have no issues!
customer_reviews.author: SarahN

customer_reviews.title: Best razor ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the razors I have used them all my life but day after I used it gave me a rash on the front of my legs I am going to wait two or three weeks if clear up then I will contact amazon
customer_reviews.author: georgette feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth as if you aren't using a razor at all. I bought this for my daughter as I had one. The down side is the handle gets slippery which makes it hard to hold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my sensitive legs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically as I have sensitive skin and my legs get razor burn. I’ve been using this for three weeks and it irritates my legs and gives me razor burn every time. I guess it depends on the person but didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... for rating this poorly since it was so highly recommended by many beauty experts
customer_reviews.text: I feel badly for rating this poorly since it was so highly recommended by many beauty experts, but it gave me terrible razor burn. Sticking with my 5 blade Venus Swirl that works perfectly (and even moreso now that I started using coconut oil to shave with!).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gandolfo

customer_reviews.title: Red bumps
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but it does cause red bumps after but I’m sure it’s because of the blades as that’s a reaction of the skin to the blade
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Chuckluck

customer_reviews.title: A reliable fave!
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive skin friendly and moisturizing formula!! Suction of holder works well on a clean scrubbed surface ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this razor for years and absolutely love it. It makes my skin feel great. However there was supposed to be a suction holder for the shower and it was missing from the package.
customer_reviews.author: jennam781

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this razor! Fits great in my hand and is very easy to use and very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this razor! I’ll never go back! I shave pretty often, like daily, and other razors were irritating my skin. They were burning my skin after each use. Once I started using this razor my skin was healed immediately. I love them! Subscribed!
customer_reviews.author: Jovenisse Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt get close enough to the skin and is wide. Not great for bikini area. I do like the fact that I dont have to use shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Powers

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I first used this product, I have liked it a lot. I does not feel harsh, it is very soft on my skin. I still use shaving cream with this product but it is not necessary. I only have one problem with this product which is that the head with the moisture runs out fairly quickly for me since I try to get every single hair, which leads me to using it for quite a while. Other than that, the product is good since I can easily use shaving cream when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this razor best thing they could have invented also the results are amazing will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dakew

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: All the hair gets caught and clogged- can’t use more than a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far not working for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am so far very disappointed in this razor! It does not seem to shave very close, but I will try some more.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite razor, I’ve used it since high school and had to come to Amazon to buy! It makes your legs so smooth and no scratches ever! Love love LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Clean and smooth
customer_reviews.text: One of the best razors out there. It cleans and shaves smoothly with no cuts. Always first choice
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCouple

customer_reviews.title: Shave before you leave home..
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I would only maybe take this razor on a camping trip or weekend getaway..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient, glides easily, soap smells good. Perfect for beginner shavers as it's easier not to cut yourself
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: where has this been all my life??
customer_reviews.text: I started writing this review in my head as I was using it for the first time. I honestly felt like I had finally been let in on a secret that had been kept from me my whole life. this thing is SO EASY TO USE, it made shaving so much faster and so much more efficient. you can barely feel it shaving you, it glides so smoothly and gets all the hair. I love it, and I can't believe I've had to shave for so many years without it. one thing I don't like is the squeaky clean feeling you get after rinsing, but that's a personal dislike and doesn't stop me from wanting to use it at all
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Corneilson

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart on the first use. As soon as I turned it upside down the moisturizer bar broke off. Never tried this kind, but probably won't try again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good razor!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS RAZOR! Ugh it makes my skin so soft and it's definitely not like other razors! This also smells so wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Alexyz Boganowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as her first shaver. It is great. No cuts and moisturizes the legs at the same time. Another perk is it’s cheaper than at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K. McChesney

customer_reviews.title: Razor burn
customer_reviews.text: First use was horrible won’t use or buy again. Worst razor burn ever. A friend had recommended but my experience had nothing positive.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and these are perfect. Cost a little more, but I use even just the razor part with bath jel when I run out
customer_reviews.author: GinB

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten quite a few shaves out of this and it's still going strong. I love that I don't need to add soap or shave gel. This razor makes it easier to shave with my arthritis, since I don't have to lather up first. Wish I would have discovered this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole c.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have use this type of razors for 5 year now and if you have sensitive skin this produc is for you
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Churkova

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor + cream
customer_reviews.text: The razor was very nice. It didn’t give me a complete close shave with only a few swipes but it was faster compared to the razor I was using previously. The cream block around it felt nice and didn’t leave the shaved area itchy or red afterwards which was also good.
customer_reviews.author: E****

customer_reviews.title: Great razor but does not last
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome razors for about 2 uses. The razor itself is great but the soap/cream on the outer part diminished extremely quickly. Wish it would last a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best razor ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor, so fast and easy to use, no need for shaving gel, and works well for sensitive skin. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for traveling and camping. No need to bring shaving cream, just one of these! They smell good, and doesn't bother my sensitive skin. Less irritation and razor bumps. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: Been using this razor for a decade at least. ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this razor for a decade at least. So convenient. Sometimes when purchased online I get subpar soap blades that seem to melt too quickly or where the soap falls off shortly after I start using. Didn’t happen on this order
customer_reviews.author: Ura Beatch

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and more
customer_reviews.text: Eliminated almost 90% of my razor burn and bumps also I have eczema and psoriasis which doesn’t help the dry skin problem but this razor is definitely the best I have found!! No more embarrassing bumps which is the best part. Not even an expensive razor compared to the rest on the market. Feels nice in the hand!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Finally A Awesome  Razor for A Great $$Price
customer_reviews.text: I just love this razor,nice grip,lathers up on its own.I will order again
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Person

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this razor but it gave me razor bumps bad under my arms and bikini area..
customer_reviews.author: K'Tina

customer_reviews.title: Schick Intuition razor for women
customer_reviews.text: It has to be better than the one I have been using.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: All in one! Try it, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good moisturizer. Very easy to handle. No need for shaving cream..
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love it I nicked myself once but I didn’t even feel it and it’s so smooth I question if I’m even getting the hair but that’s good. Only thing Is I think the bar goes down quite fast but I don’t know how much replacements are (you get one extra)
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy to use, no extras needed. Been using this product for years. Great price, cheaper than stores
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: For my sensitive skin this work perfect. Won't buy anything else but this. Perfect for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Martinez

customer_reviews.title: First time using a razor
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by a friend. It s def easy to use for someone trying razor for the very first time. The only thing I don’t like about this is that ... it s not always easy to take out all the hairs on the blades...
customer_reviews.author: QingChen

customer_reviews.title: No go for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizer doesn’t last at all. Did not work for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give a close shave
customer_reviews.text: Because of the moisturizing bar being so thick, you don’t get a close enough shave. I just shaved my legs 24 hours ago and there is stubble from the razor not being close enough to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan s.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Always leaves my skin feeling soft and almost like I got a wax
customer_reviews.author: Carmen DiGiacinto

customer_reviews.title: Don't know whether I got a dud, Schick changed ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know whether I got a dud, Schick changed or what but razor blades look very cheap. I thought when it read 2 refills, it meant razors that came attached plus 2 refills. Not worth money with just one
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good price point.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better thought out product for women by Schick. Easy to use and stores well with the provided suction cup holder. Over all a good device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Better deal than other retailers. Great for my wife and her sensitivity to razors. She says it cuts the hassle out of shaving, not to mention the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan r.

customer_reviews.title: Not goos for dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product does not go along with my sensitive skin... It irritates my skin once using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Law

customer_reviews.title: Soap does not last
customer_reviews.text: The soap lasted for about 3 days... I shave my legs everyday so this doesn't work for me...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs out
customer_reviews.text: Really great for getting a close shave...not the best but very good for getting not cuts....soap runs out realllll quick....shave only two times then the soap runs out....hard to clean the razor when the soap is on
customer_reviews.author: Carys Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Itchy and dry after use
customer_reviews.text: Horrible razor. It left my legs feeling extremely itchy and very uncomfortable. I have never had a razor leave my legs feeling so itchy and dry! If you have sensitive skin please do not use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product and thanks to Amazon for posting my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and this is one of the only razors I can use on my legs that don't give me a burning sensation afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: I listened to all the reviews about over wetting it and being careful and in less than a week the lotion cracked and broke off the razor. Too expensive for that to happen and all that product was wasted. I’ll continue to use my shaving butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Skip a step. No need for shaving gels or shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with its cutting my legs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it, BUT I tried a couple of times in the shower. Kept cutting my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: nice razor
customer_reviews.text: i love this razor, been using this brand for 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: hkcaro129

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Have only been nicked a couple of times compared to dozens of times with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Pru

customer_reviews.title: All of the newer women’s razors are horrible. I use men’s now
customer_reviews.text: All of the newer women’s razors are horrible. I use men’s now. I just want a good old fashioned clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with Caution
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these razors for years and love them. I’m giving this three stars because the description says that it comes with a mount for the shower and the one I received did not. I would be lying if I said I wasn’t disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: Also good for men!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for men who have sensitive skin and who want a clean shave
customer_reviews.author: Guapong Gurang

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: The soap bar on it does not work. The razor sticks out too far so the soap doesn't actually work. It is not recommended for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Easy razor blade with good moisturizer too.
customer_reviews.text: Razor is easy to use and move over skin easily. The moisturizer helps to makes skin soft for easy use. Will buy refill of razor blades.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: works on legs but not armpits
customer_reviews.text: hasn't given me a rash but it doesn't work on armpits?
customer_reviews.author: S A

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I actually had razor bumps and cuts for the first time in years after using this razor. Kind of goes against the purpose? I wouldn’t buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Not fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not a really great product as well as not a bad product
customer_reviews.author: nagesh

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these razors. I can get everything shaved that i need and does not irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morlan

customer_reviews.title: luv these
customer_reviews.text: very simple to use. don't need shaving cream. use these all the time
customer_reviews.author: donna larson

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t shave very well. And if I try to shave hardly, it scratches my skin :(. It’s just a razor and surrounded by a soap bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying on sale inly
customer_reviews.text: It's not a miracle shaver. I knicked myself the first time. The blades will wear out long before the soap goes away.
customer_reviews.author: maryt

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Runs out very quickly. Not my favorite razor. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Linsey c

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Weird razor. The shaving gel Part wears out on either the top or bottom and the shave isn’t close at all on legs. Good for underarms
customer_reviews.author: William Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to description
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan doesn’t give a nice smooth shave
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I won't use any other razor. I saw it in the store and found that it is cheaper actually on Amazon. I am a first time user of this product and I would recommend this razor to anyone especially to a young lady shaving for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: no knicks no cuts
customer_reviews.text: favorite razors long time customer never cut myself with these
customer_reviews.author: rainnnaturelover

product_meta.title: Schick Intuition Sensitive Care Razor for Women with 2 Moisturizing Razor Blade Refills with Natural Aloe
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Sensitive Care RazorThe Schick Intuition System is the first all-in-one shaving solution - no shave gel needed! Schick Intuition Lathers & Shaves in One Easy Step. The Schick Intuition Naturals Sensitive Care Razor contains ingredients that offer the purest form of sensitive care. Intuition Naturals provides five elements of skin care – Aloe, Vitamin E, Hypoallergenic, Fragrance Free and No Artificial Colors. Additionally, 55% of the packaging consisting of post consumer recycled materials.
feature_bullets: Schick(r) intuition(r) for women put shave cream right on the razor
LATHERS and MOISTURIZES during shaving no need for soap, shave gel or body wash
UNIQUE SKIN CONDITIONING SOLID enriched with Vitamin E and 100 Percent natural Aloe for moisturizing sensitive skin during shaving. Also, Hypo Allergenic and gentle on your skin
FOUR BLADES that allow for a precise shave
PIVOTING HEAD that follows the contours of a woman's body to help minimize nicks and cuts
